discussion.content:

this ensures that employees only have access to the data they need to perform their duties, reducing the likelihood of inappropriate access to customer information

questions.question_text: A data processor that handles personal data for multiple customers has decided to migrate its data warehouse to a third-party provider. What is the processor obligated to do prior to implementation?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Legal Obligation: Under regulations like the GDPR, processors must follow the instructions of controllers and obtain their approval for using sub-processors or making changes to data handling.

Accountability: Data controllers are ultimately responsible for ensuring the security and privacy of the personal data they collect and process through third parties. The processor must inform them so they can assess and approve any associated risks.

choices.C: Obtain assurance that data subject requests will continue to be handled appropriately.
choices.A: Seek approval from all in-scope data controllers.
choices.B: Ensure data retention periods are documented.
choices.D: Implement comparable industry-standard data encryption in the new data warehouse.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
A read-only data warehouse ensures that users can only query and view data, without the ability to execute write operations (such as INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements).

choices.B: Create encrypted versions of the data.
choices.C: Exclude access to specific tables or columns of data.

questions.question_text: Of the following, who is the BEST resource for determining which privacy laws must be followed for data that crosses international borders?

choices.A: The legal counsel for the organization that plans to collect the data
choices.B: The government in the country where the data is initially collected
choices.C: The chief information security officer (CISO) in the country that processes the data
choices.D: The chief risk officer (CRO) for the organization that plans to collect the data

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The legal counsel is the most appropriate resource for determining which privacy laws must be followed for data that crosses international borders
